unnormalised: Hey everyone, heard about the solar rooftop subsidies! Thinking of getting one for my house in Chennai. Rs. 50,000 seems like a good chunk. Maybe I can finally run the AC 24/7 without feeling guilty! Heard Tata Power offers good schemes. Plus, imagine the Diwali lights powered by the sun! Beats paying crazy electricity bills. Need to check if my roof can handle the load though. Anyone else in India got solar panels? Is it worth the investment, especially considering the price of biryani these days?
